Senior Manager, Advocacy & Community Marketing, Intercom

@KateSugrue

You satisfy your customers, but can you satisfy our curiosity?

With Lauren Gilbert, Senior Customer Happiness Manager at Memberful.

Please tell us a little bit about your company and what you do there.
I am the Senior Customer Happiness Manager at Memberful. We help independent publishers, educators, and creators sell memberships to their audience and build sustainable businesses.

What‚Äôs the most valuable thing that working in customer service has taught you?
One of the most valuable lessons I‚Äôve learned from working in customer service is the importance of staying calm and not jumping to conclusions. It‚Äôs easy to react immediately when faced with a problem, but I‚Äôve found that taking a step back to investigate thoroughly often reveals that things aren‚Äôt as broken as they seem.

Doing your due diligence before acting not only leads to better solutions, but also helps build trust with customers because they appreciate you taking the time to truly understand the issue instead of rushing to a quick (and sometimes incorrect) fix.

Describe the essence of great customer service using only three words.
Prompt. Personable. Clear.

What can you do that a bot will never be able to replicate?
Human support shines in areas where empathy, creativity, and nuanced understanding are key.

What‚Äôs the most embarrassing thing you‚Äôve ever said/done to a customer?
I was jumping into a chat that was started by one of my teammates, and wrote, ‚ÄúLauren, humping in!‚Äù instead of ‚Äújumping in!‚Äù (The ‚ÄúJ‚Äù and ‚ÄúH‚Äù are side-by-side on the keyboard.)

What‚Äôs your greatest productivity hack?
Work with your natural tendencies! If you‚Äôre a morning person, get your most brain-taxing tasks done in the morning and do the easiest tasks in the afternoon.

What book are you reading at the moment?
Hyperbole and a Half¬† by Allie Brosh.

What‚Äôs the best thing a customer has ever said to you?
‚ÄúMemberful customer service is what you wish all customer service was, but you rarely find. Fast, reliable, and always extremely helpful.‚Äù
